titleStmt.title: A full and true relation of the murther of Doctor Urthwait, Archdeacon of the Isle of Man; who in an inhuman and barbarous manner, cut his own throat, in Curriers-Hall-Court, within Criple-Gate, on wednesday the twentieth of this instant December; with several other circumstances thereunto appertaining.

A full and true relation of the murther of Doctor Urthwait, Archdeacon of the Isle of Man; who in an inhuman and barbarous manner, cut his own throat, in Curriers-Hall-Court, within Criple-Gate, on wednesday the twentieth of this instant December; with several other circumstances thereunto appertaining.

notesStmt.note: Urthwait's landlady found him dead by his own hand 19 Dec. 1688.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
